data.name: We Took That Trip
data.detailed_description:
TALK WITH THE DEVS


About the Game

We Took That Trip is a narrative road trip game. Full of lofi songs and chill moments.
The story will become emotional, be prepared.


Key features:


Road
  • Travel through procedural roads. The road is never the same
  • Variety of biomes (hills, forests, deserts, beaches, swamps, fields...)

Car
  • You will drive your beloved old kombi van. You love it so bad, but unfortunately, it is old and can break a lot
  • It is full of tricks. Luckily you wrote a manual and you can read it whenever you need to remember how to handle its problems

Puzzles
  • Sometimes you'll need to solve some puzzles to unlock new roads and new items

Explore
  • The road is full of great stuff to discover
  • The explorers can learn more about the friend's story
  • Find every character and hidden spot

Chill Out
  • The soundtrack puts you in the mood with tracks by awesome artists on the internet
  • Enjoy the beautiful landscapes
  • Dynamic weathers
  • Dynamic time with gorgeous sunsets, sunrises, moonrises...

Friends
  • Get all of them on the way, the ride is much better with the ones that you love
  • Discover their stories and revive great moments

Cat
  • Yes, there's a cat, and he's inseparable. So he is gonna enjoy the ride with you (if you find him)
  • You can pet him and he loves it

Customize
  • Paint your loved van
  • Change cosmetic parts and make it feels like home

Zen mode
  • If you are just looking to relax and refresh your mind, this mode is just for this
  • Choose who you want to go with or drive alone

data.short_description: A calm and relaxing road trip with your best friends through procedural roads. You have two main reasons to enjoy the ride in no hurry: 1) Lots of landscapes, lots of loFi music, and atmospheric places. 2) You'll be driving your old van, so be aware that it can break a lot on the way.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
